description: Standardized document requirements for UNIBEXS application system

admission.description: Documents required for university application submission

documents.name: Passport Scan
documents.description: Clear scan of passport bio page - must be valid

validationRules.validity: Passport must be valid for at least 6 months

documents.name: High School Certificate / Transcript
documents.description: Official high school graduation documents - minimum to issue offer letter

validationRules.language: English translation required if not in English
validationRules.completeness: Must include all subjects and grades

documents.name: Bachelor's Certificate + Transcript
documents.description: Official bachelor degree documents - academic history for postgrad

validationRules.language: English translation required if not in English
validationRules.gpa: Must show GPA or equivalent grading system

documents.name: Master's Certificate + Transcript
documents.description: Official master degree documents - required for PhD admission

validationRules.language: English translation required if not in English

documents.name: English Certificate (IELTS/MUET/etc.)
documents.description: English proficiency test results - required for unconditional offer

validationRules.allSkills: Must show scores for all skills (reading, writing, listening, speaking)

documents.name: Statement of Purpose
documents.description: Personal statement for graduate programs - especially for coursework or research programs

validationRules.content: Must explain academic goals and research interests
validationRules.specific: Should be specific to chosen program

documents.name: Research Proposal
documents.description: Detailed research proposal - must be in line with faculty research

validationRules.length: Typically 5-10 pages for Master, 10-15 pages for PhD
validationRules.structure: Must include methodology, literature review, timeline
validationRules.alignment: Must align with faculty research areas

documents.name: Recommendation Letters (2)
documents.description: Academic or professional references - preferably from academic referees

validationRules.relevant: Should be from relevant academic or professional contacts

documents.name: CV / Resume
documents.description: Current curriculum vitae - relevant for research or mature applicants

validationRules.relevant: Should highlight relevant experience and achievements

documents.name: White Background Photo
documents.description: Passport-style photograph - required by some universities, mandatory during visa

documents.name: Birth Certificate
documents.description: Official birth certificate - public unis may ask for this

validationRules.language: English translation required if not in English

documents.name: Address Proof
documents.description: Utility bill or official address proof - based on university policy

validationRules.name: Must show applicant's name and address
validationRules.official: From recognized utility company or government agency

documents.name: Application Form
documents.description: University-specific application form - may be required in custom format

visa.description: Documents required for visa application and immigration

documents.name: Offer Letter
documents.description: Official university offer letter - provided by university after acceptance

validationRules.official: Must be on official university letterhead
validationRules.complete: Must include all program details and conditions
validationRules.valid: Must be valid and not expired

documents.name: Visa Application Form
documents.description: Completed visa application form - usually EMGS or similar formats

documents.name: Medical Report (EMGS format)
documents.description: Medical examination report in required format

validationRules.format: Must be in EMGS or immigration-specified format
validationRules.doctor: Must be from approved medical center/doctor
validationRules.complete: All required tests must be included

documents.name: Bank Statement
documents.description: Financial proof documents showing sufficient funds

validationRules.balance: Must show sufficient balance for tuition and living expenses

documents.name: Sponsor Letter / Financial Guarantee
documents.description: Sponsorship documentation if applicable

validationRules.details: Must include sponsor details and relationship

documents.name: Visa Fee Receipt
documents.description: Proof of visa fee payment

validationRules.amount: Must show correct visa fee amount

documents.name: Passport-Size Photo
documents.description: Recent passport-sized photographs for visa

validationRules.size: Must be standard passport photo size

documents.name: Affidavit Letter
documents.description: Required if name differs between passport and academic documents

conditionalLogic.description: Required only if passport name differs from academic certificates

validationRules.official: Must be on official letterhead or legal format

documents.name: Yellow Fever Certificate
documents.description: Yellow fever vaccination certificate - required for Sudanese students

validationRules.valid: Must be valid (within 10 years of vaccination)
validationRules.official: Must be from authorized medical center

documents.name: NOC from Embassy
documents.description: No Objection Certificate from home country embassy

conditionalLogic.description: Required for students from Sudan, Oman, and Libya

validationRules.embassy: Must be from official embassy or consulate
validationRules.purpose: Must clearly state purpose for study abroad

Sudan.specialInstructions: Sudanese students require Yellow Fever Certificate and NOC from embassy
Sudan.processingNote: Additional processing time may be required for embassy NOC

Oman.specialInstructions: Omani students require NOC from embassy
Oman.processingNote: Embassy NOC processing may take 2-4 weeks

Libya.specialInstructions: Libyan students require NOC from embassy
Libya.processingNote: Embassy NOC processing may take 2-4 weeks

validationMessages.fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeds maximum allowed limit
validationMessages.invalidFileType: File type not supported for this document
validationMessages.required: This document is required for your application
validationMessages.conditional: This document is required based on your program or nationality
validationMessages.optional: This document is optional but recommended
validationMessages.uploadError: Failed to upload document. Please try again.
